name: Keyhole Dragonette
description: The Keyhole Dragonette is a tiny dragon known for its exceptional agility and ability to navigate tight spaces. Its scales are striking and vibrant, showcasing its draconic heritage.
memorable: Its unique ability to squeeze through 1-inch openings and its soporific breath that can incapacitate foes makes it a clever and unexpected challenge.
goals: Typically acts as a scout and infiltrator, often seeking out small or hidden areas.
relations: Related to other dragon species and may be encountered with small animal companions.
environment: Often found in areas with tight spaces like caves or dense forests.
strengths: Possesses excellent stealth skills and can effectively combat swarms, ignoring their defenses against piercing and slashing damage.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits strategic planning; easily outsmarted in complex scenarios.
attacks: Can deliver a bite attack and a slashing Scale Slash, both effective in close quarters.
most_powerful_ability: Soporific Breath prevents enemies from acting, providing a tactical advantage in ambush situations.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, allowing it to detect creatures in low visibility and through barriers.
skills: Excels in stealth and has decent perception to notice nearby threats.
additional_information: Can pick locks and disarm traps with its tongue.
Highly mobile, able to leap without provoking opportunity attacks.
Acts as a good infiltrator due to its small size.
Offers utility outside combat, particularly in sneaking or scouting roles.
Particularly effective against swarms of beasts.
test_queries: tiny dragon that excels at stealth and scouting
dragon that can squeeze through small spaces
versatile dragon with soporific breath ability
dragonette that can pick locks with its tongue
mobile dragon that jumps without provoking attacks
